message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $17,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
